long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Posture Fix is a Chrome extension engineered to enhance user well-being by issuing periodic alerts for posture adjustment. Every couple of minutes, a notification will prompt you to check your posture, thereby facilitating continued focus and promoting a healthier back.
